name: Swoop In
text:
Place yourself into a space in radius, adjacent to an enemy hero.
**This turn:** Heroes in radius must attack you, if able, when performing an attack action. The first time you discard a card, gain 2 coins.

name: Step In
text:
Place yourself into a space in radius, adjacent to an enemy hero.
**This turn:** Heroes in radius must attack you, or a minion, if able, when performing an attack action. The first time you discard a card, gain 2 coins.

name: Watch Me Soar
text:
You may move through obstacles.
**This turn:** You are immune to non-ranged attacks and skills. Ignore the effects of tokens. Other units may move through you.

name: Challenge Accepted
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If the target defends successfully, gain 2 coins.

name: Matter of Honor
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If the target defends successfully, gain 3 coins.

name: Worthy Opponent
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you. If you target a hero, that hero cannot choose to not defend.
After the attack: If the target defends successfully, gain 4 coins.

name: Power Shot
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: If the target is not adjacent to you, you may move it 1 space, to a space farther away from you.

name: Thunder Shot
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: If the target is not adjacent to you, you may move it 1 space, to a space farther away from you, up to 2 times.

name: Focus
text: **Next turn:** After you resolve a skill, you may repeat it once.

name: Discipline
text: **Next turn:** After you resolve an attack or a skill, you may repeat it once. Cannot attack the same hero twice this way.

name: Mastery
text: **Next turn:** After you resolve an attack or a skill, you may repeat it once. Cannot attack the same hero twice this way.

name: Dash and Slash
text: **Next turn:** The first enemy hero you move through discards a card, if able. If a hero discards a card this way, gain 1 coin.

name: Death from Above
text: **Next turn:** The first enemy hero you move through discards a card, or is defeated. If a hero discards a card this way, gain 2 coins.

name: Sudden Breeze
text: Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line ignoring the obstacles.

name: Gust of Wind
text:
Move up to 3 spaces in a straight line ignoring the obstacles.
You may place 1 unit moved through into a space adjacent to you.

name: Crushing Squall
text:
Move up to 4 spaces in a straight line ignoring the obstacles.
You may place 1 unit moved through into a space adjacent to you.

name: Living Tornado
text: Swap two enemy units in radius, not adjacent to you.

name: Storm Spirit
text: Swap with an enemy in radius, not adjacent to you, or swap two enemy units in radius, not adjacent to you.

name: Power Overwhelming
text:
You may move through obstacles.
Your actions with “**Next turn:**” active effects count as if they had a “**This round:**” active effect instead.
